attributes.action: Prevent the board of RBS Bank (and Lloyds Banking Group if possible) from paying bonus payments,over and above existing contractual salary levels,to executive, senior and middle management.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition does not in any way effect the bonus payments made to the hard working "Front and Back office" staff/employees who earn anything from £15,000 to £30,000 pa. These bonus payments should continue to be paid to this level of staff/employee as the payments form a core part of their total remuneration package.
